title: Zeit to the Heart 8/27: Where's Joe, Jacob Wohl, Lord + Taylor, Gamescom
itunes:title: Zeit to the Heart 8/27: Where's Joe, Jacob Wohl, Lord + Taylor, Gamescom
description:
On this edition of Zeit to the Heart Jack and Miles discuss the confusing hashtag #WheresJoe in which the Trump campaign forgets that Biden's not the President right now, Jacob Wohl is trying phone-in scare tactics against mail-in voting, Lord + Taylor is going out of business, and lots of announcements at this year's Gamescom (like Fall Guys season 2!)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
